title: Ice Rink Tarps.com Welcomes in the Fall with all Ice Rink Liners with Expanded Sizes, Plus 10% OFF for a Limited Time and Free Shipping over $99
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Ice Rink Tarps.com Welcomes in the Fall with all Ice Rink Liners with Expanded Sizes, Plus 10% OFF for a Limited Time and Free Shipping over $99 As the temperature drops it is time to start thinking about your backyard ice rink plans. Here at Ice Rink Tarps.com, we have been planning the new season since the summer and are now pleased to announce our first phase of stock has arrived. BONITA SPRINGS, FL, October 10, 2015 /24-7PressRelease/ -- What can you expect from us this year? We aim to meet three goals; best quality, lowest price and unrivaled customer service. We have more than 20 years combined experience in the polyethylene industry so we know good quality liners when we see them. We want you to enjoy every minute on the ice without any worries of sub quality products, so you can rest assured when you purchase your liner from us, it has our seal of approval. Our price promise ensures that you are getting the very best deal on the web. It's simple, if you find a comparable product online that is cheaper, we will beat it by 5%. It's as easy as that! Unlike many other liner companies, we are family run. With a young family ourselves, we understand that making memories with your loved ones is paramount to a happy life. We want to ensure we do everything we can to help you make those memories unforgettable for all the right reasons. No standardized sales pitch, no hidden agendas, no confusing gimmicks; just friendly advice when you need it and a personal buying experience tailored to your individual needs. To ensure you're getting the right products for your requirements, we have also expanded our popular Medium Duty Ice Rink Liners inventory this year with an additional 5 sizes; 35'x55', 35'x65', 40'x80', 40'x100' and 60'x80'. Making a return this season are our popular Heavy Duty Liners which are proven to provide many hours of family entertainment on the ice. For a limited time only get 10% off your entire online order, Expires Sunday 10/18 at 11:59pm EST. Use coupon code : PR10 Don't forget we always offer FREE Ground Shipping over $99 If you have any questions regarding your intentions for the skating season, please don't hesitate to contact us ; we'll do our utmost to fulfill and hopefully exceed your expectations. Ice Rink Tarps LLC www.icerinktarps.com Here at Ice Rink Tarps.com, we believe that winter provides some of the most entertaining, old-fashioned, family fun and we hope that in providing only the finest Ice Rink Liner Tarps and Accessories, you too can enjoy all that the season has to offer. We are a family owned company whom specializes in Ice Rink Liners and Accessories. We are excited to offer one of the widest ranges of prefabricated Ice Rink Liner Tarps on the web and with free delivery over $99.00, our prices and quality are unsurpassed by any other supplier. We support our quality products with our friendly and knowledgeable customer service - if you have any questions or queries that cannot be answered online, then please don't hesitate to contact us and we will work wholeheartedly to assist you. # # #
